name: 騎士姬庫拉莉絲
description:
《Claris the Princess Knight》
※Supported language: English、Traditional Chinese、Japanese
Claris is the best mage and swordsman in the kingdom.
One day, she is possessed by the robber who killed her.
His mission is to manipulate and kill her, till she has fallen.
Knight Claris’s fate is depending on you !
Game Features
▹Domination system
▹100+ erotic events
▹You can change your favorite clothes
▹Multiple endings
